entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear.
entry.summary: Clear. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of showers. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear.
entry.summary: Clear. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny.
entry.summary: Sunny. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear.
entry.summary: Clear. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny.
entry.summary: Sunny. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
